description:
Join us in War Thunder for FREE at https://playwt.link/joinltt Get an exclusive bonus using our link - thanks for supporting the channel!

While we love looking at cool gaming monitors with features like MiniLED and QD-OLEDs, Dasung is coming to us today with something out of left field, an E-INK display. That’s right the same tech that graces the Amazon Kindle is in a monitor now. Only this time it is in color! Could this be the difference between e-ink and e-stink?

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1573070-the-worst-monitor-ever%E2%80%A6-in-color/

Check out the DASUNG Paperlike Color E-ink Monitor: https://lmg.gg/oxaWx
Check out the DASUNG Paperlike E-ink Monitor: https://lmg.gg/6yXk3

title: The Worst Monitor Ever… In Color!
